summary: The Main Menu is now black and silent, which is cleaner, smoother, and more Sinister than before.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

This is a Main Menu replacer. The menu is now black and silent, which is cleaner, smoother, and Darker than before.

[center][youtube]Us1OC-wisRY[/youtube][/center]
[center][b]I am having some sort of issue with Fraps.[/b][/center]
[center][b]The static you hear in the video is NOT from the mod.[/b][/center]
[center][b]Your menu will be dead silent other than navigation fx,[/b][/center]

I used two of IceKK menu mods, So I offer him a big thanks, and I recommend that everyone check out and use his mods, as they really clean up the main menu, and many have said that they have achieved faster load times and performance.

No Bethesda Logo In Menu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8023/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?[/url]

No Menu and Loading Smoke
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?[/url]

Compatibility: This mod is not compatible with other mods that 'replace' the main menu screen or music.

Installation: Merge this Data folder with the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

Uninstallation: Remove the following file: Data/Music/Special/mus_maintheme.xwm
Uninstallation: Remove the following file: Data/Textures/Interface/Objects/mainmenuwallpaper.dds

As always, your criticism and endorsements are most welcome.

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]
author: Drail3
